page.title: 19Children's Impressions.
page.content:
I enjoyed being there because I like silence and country side.I'm not sure I would like to live there because I would be cut off from the outside world and because I enjoy being with people. {Michael Hearfield The valley is O.K.but I wouldn't like to live there because of the hills (but it would be great for sledging). {Jamie Chandler} ..good for playing 'freo'-(lots of hiding places).. {Charlotte Owen
Looking down upon the valley, Whatever we see we make a tally.
Looking down upon the farms, Seeing all the scattered barns.
Twelve o'clock-that's the time When we all go back to dine. {Susan Wells
